comment: I took Engineering Economy this past Fall 2020 and really enjoyed my class. Professor Denalsky does a good job at mixing the in-person and online classes and is attentive. She is certainly caring and a good teacher by using simple examples and wonderful explanation techniques. Once you get used to her slight accent you will do great.

Prof Denalsky is a great teacher. Engineering Economy is a Microsoft Excel based class. Prof will explain & demonstrate all functions and go over in detail/review if asked. Whether online or in person , ATTENDANCE IS A MUST. All work: HW, quizzes & exam are delivered/submitted online along with study guides for exam prep
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
